Just Farmer and Agriculture

Join the Hands!

ADOPT 1 ACRE

Program Designed for Consumers; consumers will pay some amount in advance to procure produce directly from farmed field for their consumption.

Read More

ADOPT A VILLAGE

SRI Associations launched a program to work with Corporate Sector Companies on CSR grounds to Develop from Chosen (Selected) Village/s

Read More

SUPPORT

Agriculture needs support in form of "Donation"s are invited to help farmers in all aspectsof life and make them to feel noble-ism about their profession to work efficiently.

Read More

SAVE SEEDS

Native/Heirloom Seed collected from resources like Tribes, Remote Village Farmers, Conservators has to be cultivated for future generations.

Read More

Let us Change the World!

To transform the world, we must begin with ourselves; and what is important in beginning with ourselves is the intention. The intention must be to understand ourselves and not to leave it to others to transform themselves or to bring about a modified change through revolution, either of the left or of the right. It is important to understand that this is our responsibility, yours and mine... - Jiddu Krishnamurthy (Great Philosopher)

IFIDC ORG

Indian Farmer Integrated Development Co-operative Organisation is a wing of SRI Associations. As name indicates work for Farmers and Agriculture.
